verse: After David was living in his own house, he said to Nathan the prophet, “Look! I am living in a house of cedar, but the Ark of the Covenant of the Lord sits under tent curtains.”
Nathan said to David, “Do everything that is in your heart, because God is with you.”
But that night the word of God came to Nathan.
“Go and tell David my servant these things.”
Nathan told David all the words that had been revealed in this vision.
Then King David went and sat before the Lord and said:
